page.title: 20Jobs & places of Work.
page.content: A Aircrew & ground staff 11 * C Commerce 14 D Domestic employees 10 * E Estate employees non agric. 7 * F Farmers and agricultural w. 35 * G Chemical,coal,oil &steel w. 10 H Haulage & their depot staff 14 I Housewives 46 L Leisure (country club etc) 5 * N Not Known 3 O Office and clerical 24 P Power and light industry 7 R Railway workers 3 S Retired. 52 T Trades and crafts 6 * U Unemployed 7 W Educational and Welfare 11 Part-time jobs =1.Many that ____ ___ travel go to Grimsby /Imming-265 74 -ham.We have excluded those away near from home,and students.Last years electoral roll gives 308 people.
